description.gold-silver:
Scares wild foes
to end battle.
description.crystal:
Scares wild foes
to end battle.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the foe flee to end
the battle.
description.emerald:
Makes the foe flee to end
the battle.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.
description.diamond-pearl:
The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.
description.platinum:
The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.
description.black-white:
The target is scared off and replaced by
another Pokémon in its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.
description.black-2-white-2:
The target is scared off and switched.
In the wild, a battle against a single
Pokémon ends.
description.x-y:
The target is scared off, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The target is scared off, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
description.sun-moon:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out.
description.sword-shield:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

effect.full:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.shortEffect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
